text:
Profile 
Immediate Opening for a BOILER SERVICE TECHNICIAN in the BAY Area We are interested in a quality, career minded technician to join our team as a boiler & water heater service and repair specialist. Benrich Service Company, Inc. is a stable and well known industry leader. We service water heating and water treatment equipment and plumbing. TRAINING AND SERVICE TRUCK PROVIDED Medical, Dental and 401K benefits available. Pay based on experience. Work week is M-F with a rotation of on call overtime. Service and repair experience preferred. Must have a good DMV record. Must be willing to work on-call rotations for nights and weekends Must have strong mechanical aptitude. Must be a good team player and have excellent communication skills. Must be able to accept written and verbal direction from supervisor and dispatcher. Interested parties please reply (with resume if possible) to this post. Drug, Background and I-9 screening performed prior to hiring. BenrichService Company INC 
Company Profile Benrich has offices located in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, Orange County, and Arizona. Currently with a fleet of over 40 trucks, Benrich services over 200,000 apartment and condominium units, major restaurant chains, hotels, schools and colleges and maintains over 3,500 boilers and water heaters. In addition to water treatment, Benrich repairs, installs and services all brands of water heating equipment and provides full service plumbing. Employer job
